name: Gift Delivery (Jame Gam Christmas Edition)
description:
A gift needs to be delivered and it's your responsibility (for some reason) to get it where it needs to be.

Another platforming game I made for Jame Gam Christmas Edition and made in Godot Game Engine.

This takes a lot of inspiration for Celeste, especially Chapter 5. (could be considered copying)

Just play celeste lmao:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/504230/Celeste/
https://mattmakesgames.itch.io/celesteclassic
https://mattmakesgames.itch.io/celeste-classic-2

Controls:

WASD/Arrows: Move

Space/Z: Jump

Comma/X: Dash

Period/C: Grab

(Wall jump by facing the opposite direction of a wall and jumping)

Soundtrack:
it'll be uploaded soon, idk
(lmao, the lights out ost is better)

(and whatever you do, do NOT press 9 in the menu!!!)
